Description: Custom Built & Distressed "Fire Worn Black" Les Paul Special Electric Guitar !!! This guitar is a HEAVILY CUSTOMIZED Les Paul Style guitar made form an old 1990's Epiphone Les Paul Secial II but Recently re-built, reliced, and then given new hardware prior to being professionally set up. Very Unique looking and cool playing guitar! Made to look like it went thru Hellfire, but plays heavenly !!! All work completed by a professional craftsman in the USA. Features & Specs: Set mahogany neck transformed form the original bolt-on model Mahogany Body with unique "Fire Worn Black" stain finishHeadstock Re-shaped & Logo removed 22-fret rosewood fingerboard with dot inlaysAfter market Gretsch Style open-coil humbuckers, hum cancelling with medium output Tone, Volume, and 3-way Pickup SwitchFull size pots 24-3/4" scale1-5/8" nut widthChrome HardwareTune-O-Matic Bridge and Stopbar TailpieceUpgraded Wilkinson Deluxe Kluson style tuning keys - Vintage look, modern qualityDunlop Strap Buttons Set up w/ Ernie Ball 11's Made in Korea, Modified in the USA Very Good Condition HEAVILY CUSTOMIZED . Recently built and professionally set up. Very Clean on hardware, the Neck & Body were intentionally age & distressed to make it look worn. Frets have some very minor wear. Electronics, pickups, & hardware all new. PAYPAL ONLY THANKS FOR LOOKING !!!
Title: Customized MIK Epiphone LES PAUL Electric Guitar / Stripped, Relic'd, Upgraded !
ConditionDescription: HEAVILY CUSTOMIZED . Recently built and professionally set up. Very Clean on hardware, the Neck & Body were intentionally age & distressed to make it look worn. Frets have some very minor wear. Electronics, pickups, & hardware all new.
